doc:
The different types of sections indicate parts of a CSS document as parsed by GTK’s CSS parser. They are oriented towards the CSS Grammar, but may contain extensions.

More types might be added in the future as the parser incorporates more features.

members.doc:
The section describes a complete document. This section time is the only one where might return 

null
.
members.name: document

members.doc: The section defines a color. This is a GTK extension to CSS.
members.name: color_definition

members.doc: The section defines a binding set. This is a GTK extension to CSS.
members.name: binding_set

members.doc: The section defines the declaration of a CSS variable.
members.name: declaration

members.doc: The section defines the value of a CSS declaration.
members.name: value

members.doc: The section defines keyframes. See CSS Animations for details. Since 3.6
members.name: keyframes

name: CssSectionType
